title: The Lord of the Faran Hills
description: When Aulay Fitzgellis allowed himself to be talked into rebellion against his brother the king, it never crossed his mind he might not win.Now the only thing keeping his head on his shoulders is the leader of the mercenaries who defeated him.Lord Darach of the Faran Hills is willing to save Aulay, but he also has other things on his mind, the possibilities of a new type of weapon called a "musket" and how to stop his bagpipers assaulting his ears.
author: Bev Allen
